creditline: The Ted and Dr. Roberta Mann Foundation Endowment Fund
description: black and white photograph of a man and woman lying down and a seated child child on a bed in a dwelling composed of plastic sheeting and branches
signed: on back, in pencil: [DAvid Goldblatt / September 1984]
title: A Transkei family in their shelter, KTC squatter camp. The framework was made of strips of Port Jackson bush. For privacy black sheet were used around the lower part of the shelter. For light, translucent plastic was used on the dome. Cape Town
